title: Half-life - when Yb-169 reaches N over 32 atoms

content.question: A sample initially contains <math alttext="N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>N</mi></math> atoms of ytterbium-<math alttext="169" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>169</mn></math>, which has a half-life of 32 days. When will the sample have approximately <math alttext="the fraction N over 32" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>N</mi><mn>32</mn></mfrac></math> atoms of ytterbium-<math alttext="169" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>169</mn></math>?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
